text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS TRUMP needs to go NOW. Rid USA of this nasty stupid imbecile! Need a hero or two. Any suggestions ("must B legal"she said)? Impeachment didn't do it. Someone must find way B4 his murderous policies kill more. He's deadly. Needs 2 B treated like threat he is. #CoronavirusPandemic
